dmca.title: Google Told To Take Down Mandala Links
dmca.body:
LUTHER HOUSE LLC

June 2, 2003

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View CA 94043

Re: Copyright Infringement

To Whom It May Concern:

[private] and [private] are former Contractors of Luther House LLC. They have taken my ideas, website, articles and images for their own use and profit violating their contract with Luther House LLC. Here are your requirements for reporting this infringement of Copyright on their websites which are in your listings.

  1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the black line drawings of Mandalas that are on: 

    	http://www.coloringtherapy.org
    	http://www.coloringtherapy.org/free_printable_mandala.shtml
    	http://www.artworkyoucolor.com/ 
    	http://www.mandalacoloring.net/ 
    	http://www.colorthis.net/

Eleven of the Mandalas that are sold on these sites are exact copies of Mandalas from copyright VA 1-081-675 - Color This Too, VA 1-081-676 - Color This One, and a pending copyright owned by [private]. The Mandala that is being given away for free is one that is also infringing.

  2.  	Search query:		Coloring Therapy
        Infringing Web Pages: 	www.coloringtherapy.org/
				www.coloringtherapy.org/index.shtml

	Search Query:		Mandala Coloring
	Infringing Web Pages:	www.coloringtherapy.org/
				www.coloringtherapy.org/mandala_coloring.shtml
				www.colorthis.net/
				www.artworkyoucolor.com/mandalas_gallery.shtml
				www.colorthis.net/Gallery.shtml



Address:	[private]
		Seattle WA 98104-3176
Phone:		[private]


<HR>
Google, Inc.
Page 2

  3.	Luther House LLC		[private]
	[private]			Victoria BC V8T 3E4
	[private]			Canada
	Seattle WA 98104-3176
	USA

	[private]

	[private]	[private]
	[private]	[private]

  4.	[private] and [private]
	[private]			[private]
	Victoria BC V8P IJ2		[private]
	Canada

  5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

  6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you for your assistance with this request.


Sincerely,

[private]		[private]
Owner			Manager
Luther House LLC
http://www.coloringtherapy.com
http://www.mandalacoloring.com
